abstract: Suicide bomber from Al Qaeda offshoot Nusra Front kills 25 soldiers and allied militia members at Syrian Army outpost in Alepp; incident is part of campaign by several Islamist-led groups to seize areas in Aleppo still under government control.
lead_paragraph: At least 25 soldiers and allied militia members were killed after a suicide bomber from the Nusra Front blew himself up.

headline.main: Syria: Suicide Bomber Hits Army Base, Monitors Say
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Syria: Suicide Bomber Hit Army Base, Monitors Say

snippet: At least 25 soldiers and allied militia members were killed after a suicide bomber from the Nusra Front blew himself up.
